name: Aemetis, Inc.
description: Aemetis, Inc. is a renewable fuels and biochemicals company focused on the development and commercialization of advanced technologies for the production of low-carbon intensity fuels and chemicals. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Cupertino, California, Aemetis operates a renewable fuels plant in California and is actively expanding its operations to produce sustainable aviation fuel (SAF) and biodiesel. The company is committed to reducing greenhouse gas emissions and promoting sustainable energy solutions. Aemetis utilizes patented technologies to convert biomass and waste into renewable fuels, including its innovative process that converts high-carbon intensity feedstocks into low-carbon intensity products. With a strong emphasis on sustainability, Aemetis aims to support the global transition to cleaner energy sources while providing innovative solutions to meet the increasing demand for renewable energy. The company is also working on various projects to enhance its production capabilities and improve its environmental footprint, positioning itself as a leader in the renewable fuels industry.
